long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple downloader to grab books purchased on toranoana to your local storage.

After installment, click the e-book entrance of マイページ on toranoana site, enter the e-book bookshelf, you shall see a download button added below each title of the book

Please make sure your usage of this tool conform to the laws or policies  where you live in

--------------------------------------------------------

GitHub：https://github.com/HonmaMeikodesu/chrome-ext-toranoana-downloader
If you find any bugs or issues, this is probably where you should go.
If you find this extension coming in handy, consider giving this repo a star, tks!
